project.teaser: The goal of INSPIRING ERA is to leverage and accelerate the valorisation of results from the ERA Policy Agenda 2022-2024 through a service-oriented hub that connects and supports Member State, Associated Countries and Stakeholders with regard to their joint implementation of...
project.objective: The goal of INSPIRING ERA is to leverage and accelerate the valorisation of results from the ERA Policy Agenda 2022-2024 through a service-oriented hub that connects and supports Member State, Associated Countries and Stakeholders with regard to their joint implementation of the ERA actions in close collaboration with the European Commission. The project aims to create and support a culture of mutual learning, to build and strengthen a viable community of practice for ERA that thrives through from insights, and to maximize the broad uptake of valorisation of results stemming from the ERA Policy Agenda actions through the elaboration of recommendation and guidance for policy-makers.
project.title: Breathing Life into the New European Research Area and the ERA Policy Agenda Through Engaging Awareness-Raising Initiatives

article.title: Hub to valorise the ERA Policy Agenda results

category.title: EU research policy /Research policies in the EU

result.title: Interim Report on Community Building Activities
result.description: Interim report on all ERA community engagement and outreach activities organised during the project.

result.title: Interim Brief Policy Feedback for the European Commission
result.description: This Interim Brief Policy Feedback serves the purpose of describing the progress made in the project, including on the annual work plans. It must not be confused with the policy briefs listed as deliverables under work package 4, as these are targeted at the ERA community, while the interim and final Brief Policy Feedbacks are adressed at the EU Commission. They will be drafted on the basis of a template provided by the EU Commission and can be considered as part of the reporting under work package 5.

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The Data Management Plan outlines the ways in which data is collected, generated and/or processed throughout the lifespan of the project.

result.title: Compilation of Policy Briefs on Good Practices, Gaps and Recommendations for ERA Actions
result.description: This reports compiles all policy briefs on good practices, gaps and recommendations on ERA Actions identified up to month 18.

result.title: Interim Report on ERA Policy Monitoring, Screening and Analysis
result.description: The deliverable summaries the proactive, regular screening, monitoring, analysis and processing of information from the ERA Policy Platform.

result.title: Update on Dissemination, Exploitation and Communication by INSPIRING ERA
result.description: The report gives an update on all INSPIRING ERA's communication, dissemination and exploitation activities.

result.title: Interim Summary of INSPIRING ERA MLEs
result.description: Summaries are the compilation of individual MLE's (mutual learning events’) reports, enabling the preparation of insights and final recommendations.

result.title: Interim Report on Interactions with existing ERA related Measures
result.description: As an information hub, INSPIRING ERA will regularly process information and updates disseminated and displayed through further ERA related measures that are advanced through established or newly emerging communities such as ERA LEARN, TRAMI, or the recently emerged CoARA. The report summarizes all interactions with these ERA related measures.

result.title: Report on ERA Conference
result.description: This report summarises all key outcomes of the ERA conference organised by INSPIRING ERA.

result.title: Dissemination, Exploitation and Communication Strategy of INSPIRING ERA
result.description: The strategy ensures coordinated dissemination and communication of the project's activities as well as the exploitation of its output. It includes a branding and promotion kit that provides graphic materials to support communication efforts.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
